<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639baa1741ad7465d81fb3020b84c390ee49d">MachineOperand::MO&#95;JumpTableIndex</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">llvm::hash&#95;value</a>(MO);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We could explicitly handle all the types of the MachineOperand,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// here but we can just return a common number until we find a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// compelling test case where this is bad. The only side effect here</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is contributing to a hash collision but there&#39;s enough information</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (Opcodes,other registers etc) that this will likely not be a problem.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Handle the following Index/ID/Predicate cases. They can</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be hashed on in a stable manner.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#af269b990800f72c7cf535c407e8e639ba0270d8f468e7b92dafb486293ecf137d">MachineOperand::MO&#95;CFIIndex</a>:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In the cases below we havn&#39;t found a way to produce an artifact that will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// result in a stable hash, in most cases because they are pointers. We want</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VRegRenamer::renameInstsInMBB(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;NamedVReg&gt; VRegs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#afcbd4ecc474e2d218391d6d3027b086aa7861ef1db44eac8ea7a373cd7c53a7c5">Prefix</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;bb&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + std::to&#95;string(CurrentBBNumber) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MachineInstr &amp;Candidate : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t rename stores/branches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Candidate.mayStore() || Candidate.isBranch())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Candidate.getNumOperands())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look for instructions that define VRegs in operand 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">    MachineOperand &amp;MO = Candidate.getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Avoid non regs, instructions defining physical regs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() || !MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register/#ab203bbcbc320180b1da9e9a92ee0c784">isVirtual</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">    VRegs.push&#95;back(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">        NamedVReg(MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>(), Prefix + getInstructionOpcodeHash(Candidate)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VRegs.size() ? doVRegRenaming(getVRegRenameMap(VRegs)) : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/aliasanalysis-cpp/#a479b1f65525d3585f951deced4db0e36">false</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VRegRenamer::createVirtualRegisterWithLowerName(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> VReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string LowerName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/graphprogram/#a0ad4685976f8c4d4a697a53fbe05d10b">Name</a>.lower();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetRegisterClass &#42;RC = MRI.getRegClassOrNull(VReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RC ? MRI.createVirtualRegister(RC, LowerName)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">            : MRI.createGenericVirtualRegister(MRI.getType(VReg), LowerName);</Highlight></CodeLine>
